emma2.msm.estimation¶

estimation - MSM estimation from data (emma2.msm.estimation)¶

Countmatrix¶

count_matrix(dtraj, lag[, sliding]) Generate a count matrix from given list(s) of integers.

Functions

cmatrix(dtraj, lag[, sliding]) Generate a count matrix in from given list(s) of integers.
connected_cmatrix(C[, directed]) Compute the count matrix of the largest connected set.
connected_count_matrix(C[, directed]) Compute the count matrix of the largest connected set.
connected_sets(C[, directed]) Compute connected components for a directed graph with weights represented by the given count matrix.
count_matrix(dtraj, lag[, sliding]) Generate a count matrix from given list(s) of integers.
is_connected(C[, directed]) Check if C is a countmatrix for a completely connected process.
largest_connected_set(C[, directed]) Compute connected components for a directed graph with weights represented by the given count matrix.
log_likelihood(C, T) log-likelihood of T, i.e. p(C|T).
tmatrix(C[, reversible, mu]) Estimate the transition matrix from the given countmatrix.
tmatrix_sampler(C[, reversible, mu, P0]) Generate transition matrix sampler object.
transition_matrix(C[, reversible, mu]) Estimate the transition matrix from the given countmatrix.
